name: Invofox
headline: INVOFOX is the document processing AI for software companies
description:
Invofox is the document processing AI for software companies. If you need to process documents such as invoices, receipts, bills of lading and others for your customers, you can easily build a first-in-class service with minimum effort using our technology. Check out our
website and developers portal for more information.

founders.name: Alberto Gimeno, Founder
founders.description:
Computer scientist and mathematician.
Worked for years as a developer before discovering my true passion in sales.
Reach out if you're intested in literature, crossfit or baseball.

founders.name: Carmelo Juanes, Founder
founders.description: Computer scientist and mathematician. Former researcher at CSIC. Full stack developer focused on web technologies. Talk to me about parkour, bouldering and inline skating!

founders.name: Adrian Ramirez, Founder
founders.description:
Computer Engineer and Mathematician with a demonstrated history of working in the research industry. Highly skilled in many programming languages with extensive knowledge of ML and DL.
Hobbies include hiking, bouldering, soccer and beer brewing.

raw_markdown="By clicking **“Accept All Cookies”** , you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. View our [Privacy Policy](https://invofox.com/</en/privacy>) for more information.
[Preferences](https://invofox.com/<#>)[Deny](https://invofox.com/<#>)[Accept](https://invofox.com/<#>)
Privacy Preference Center
When you visit websites, they may store or retrieve data in your browser. This storage is often necessary for the basic functionality of the website. The storage may be used for marketing, analytics, and personalization of the site, such as storing your preferences. Privacy is important to us, so you have the option of disabling certain types of storage that may not be necessary for the basic functioning of the website. Blocking categories may impact your experience on the website.
[Reject all cookies](https://invofox.com/<#>)[Allow all cookies](https://invofox.com/<#>)
Manage Consent Preferences by Category
Essential
**Always Active**
These items are required to enable basic website functionality.
Marketing
Essential
These items are used to deliver advertising that is more relevant to you and your interests. They may also be used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. Advertising networks usually place them with the website operator’s permission.
Personalization
Essential
These items allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your user name, language, or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features. For example, a website may provide you with local weather reports or traffic news by storing data about your current location.
Analytics
Essential
These items help the website operator understand how its website performs, how visitors interact with the site, and whether there may be technical issues. This storage type usually doesn’t collect information that identifies a visitor.
[Confirm my preferences and close](https://invofox.com/<#>)

# The documentprocessing AI for
# software companies
# developers
# scale ups
# startups
[Talk to an expert](https://invofox.com/</en/sign-up-a>)
Backed by:
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624411d5ef09b0d95229bf69/65b0d9ecc295f247f7d87dec_YClogoHome.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624411d5ef09b0d95229bf69/65b0db4d79199440fe89a8b3_REBELlogoHome.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624411d5ef09b0d95229bf69/65b0dc36a885dd336a92885e_ARCHIPIELAGOlogoHome.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624411d5ef09b0d95229bf69/65b0dc906eaee03aacc24ffd_4FlogoHome.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624411d5ef09b0d95229bf69/65b0dca2d226a551affc71a0_JMElogoHome.svg)
[![Invofox Custom Documents - Turn files into verified data with just a click | Product Hunt](https://api.producthunt.com/widgets/embed-image/v1/top-post-topic-badge.svg?post_id=586494&theme=light&period=weekly&topic_id=237)](https://invofox.com/<https:/www.producthunt.com/posts/invofox-custom-documents?embed=true&utm_source=badge-top-post-topic-badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_souce=badge-invofox-custom-documents>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624411d5ef09b0d95229bf69/65ba2bdb9df733a18d02c2e3_HeroImageBannerResponsiveHomeGris.png)
## How it works?
1
# Upload
Upload all your documents to our platform.
![Import integrations](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624411d5ef09b0d95229bf69/647494042a3cf262737ae99d_step1.png)
2
# Process
We will sort, extract, and validate your data in seconds.
![Data Processing Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624411d5ef09b0d95229bf69/6479f9a6d65beb143350af42_step2.png)
3
# Export
Export that data into a spreadsheet or directly into an ERP of your choice.
![ERPs where you can export the data from Invofox](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624411d5ef09b0d95229bf69/6474af50101c81b74214bf4a_step3.png)
## **Our API, Your Power**
Seamless integration, stellar results! Maximize efficiency without the fuss with Invofox's API.
# **1. Sign Up**
Create your account and get your API Key.
[Try Invofox for Free >>](https://invofox.com/</en/sign-up-a>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624411d5ef09b0d95229bf69/65ba2490269edaea68dfe170_SignUpAPISliderImagesB.png)
# **2. Test our API**
Get familiar with our API documentation, identify relevant endpoints and generate code for your integration.
[Explore it now >>](https://invofox.com/<https:/developers.invofox.com>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624411d5ef09b0d95229bf69/65b90cd02710ac5dcb9b3de9_TestAPISliderImages.png)
# **3. Deploy**
Incorporate Invofox seamlessly into your software for a connected experience. Stay in the loop using our webhooks and receive asynchronous notifications whenever an event occurs.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624411d5ef09b0d95229bf69/65b79f0c020645d226bf221f_DeploySliderImages.svg)
## **Use Cases**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624411d5ef09b0d95229bf69/65b25b71460c29664e3742ad_ERPusecases.svg)
# ERP
We excel at processing a range of documents, such as invoices, bills of lading, purchase orders, and receipts, enabling you to optimize your resources across various niches.
[Read more>>](https://invofox.com/</en/erp>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624411d5ef09b0d95229bf69/65b25c112f86e9ab7f3bf73b_PaymentUsecases.svg)
# **Payment Solutions (AP, AR)**
Extract all information from invoices, including but not limited to IBAN, SWIFT code, payment method and terms, while maintaining a real-time exchange rate.
[Read more>>](https://invofox.com/</en/payment-solutions>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624411d5ef09b0d95229bf69/65b25c109a6e0c6b085126f5_accountingSoftwareUsecases.svg)
# **Accounting Software**
Make your next tax season less stressful. Our software allows users to automate data extraction from receipts and invoices, including header information as well as line items.
[Read more>>](https://invofox.com/</en/accounting-software>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624411d5ef09b0d95229bf69/65b25c10769dd664cecafb51_Expense%20Management%20Usecases.svg)
# **Expense Management**
Extract vital information such as payment method, date and time, and line items to enhance your software's functionality. This will allow you to elevate your expense approval procedures using AI.
[Read more>>](https://invofox.com/</en/expense-management>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624411d5ef09b0d95229bf69/65b28531126eaf3884262738_Document%20Management%20Usecases.svg)
# **Document Management**
Enhance your search functionality by indexing documents with our highly granular data extraction proficiency. Our software enables you to freely extract over 80 information fields
[Read more>>](https://invofox.com/</en/document-management>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624411d5ef09b0d95229bf69/65b25c12d9365f748583baf7_Sustainability%20Usecases.svg)
# **Sustainability**
Think planet first; accurately gauge your client's carbon footprint by processing utility bills, capturing essential details such as contract reference, consumption, unit of measure, unit cost, contracted power and others.
[Read more>>](https://invofox.com/</en/sustainability-management>)
# What are you waiting for?
[Get started](https://invofox.com/</en/sign-up-a>)

**Solutions**

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Invofox**

Founded in 2015, Invofox is based in Madrid, Spain, and has been making waves in the fintech and AI spaces. As part of Y Combinator's Batch S22, Invofox specializes in document processing AI tailored specifically for software companies. Their mission is straightforward yet ambitious: to streamline the handling of essential documents such as invoices, receipts, and bills of lading, making it easy for developers to build top-tier services effortlessly.

**Why Invofox?**

Invofox offers an intuitive platform where users can upload documents that the AI processes, sorts, and validates in mere seconds. This data can then be exported to spreadsheets or directly integrated into ERPs. The tech is particularly beneficial for companies in the realms of expense management, accounting, and ERP solutions, but its versatility doesn’t stop there. With capabilities to handle a variety of document types and custom fields, Invofox adapts to the unique needs of its clients.

**Team and Support**

The team is relatively small, with 12 dedicated employees guided by group partner Tom Blomfield. This lean setup allows for agility and focused customer service—key for startups and scale-ups that need robust support as they grow.

**Unique Features**

1. **Human-in-the-loop (HITL)**: Clients can enhance their document processing with human oversight when needed, ensuring higher accuracy.
2. **Embeddable Program**: Developers can easily integrate Invofox’s UI into their existing platforms without hassle.
3. **API Access**: Invofox provides developers with comprehensive API capabilities to streamline the integration process further.

**Getting Started**

For anyone in the fintech space needing to optimize their document processing, Invofox is worth a look. A simple sign-up leads to full API access, allowing seamless implementation into your tech stack. Their robust analytics and customizable features not only help businesses save time but also support them in scaling operations efficiently.

**Looking Ahead**

With a foundation built on innovation and a clear understanding of user needs, Invofox stands poised for growth in the rapidly evolving landscape of document processing. Their commitment to sustainability, diverse use cases, and user-friendly tech is likely to keep them at the forefront of the industry.

For more details or to start your journey with Invofox, check out their [website](https://invofox.com).
